description: Try our easy to follow Black Forest Truffles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Black Forest Truffles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Shape 1 tbs date mixture into a ball around each cherry. Chill until firm. Coat with extra cocoa to serve.
